titleStmt.title: A poem dedicated to the blessed memory of Her late gracious Majesty Queen Mary By Mr. Stepney.
titleStmt.author: Stepney, George, 1663-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: reprinted for Patrick Campbell, and are to be sold at his shop in Skinner-Row,
